title: Black Scourge Singed. No new particals or SFX?. Really needs new particals...
body: Finally a new Singed skin is coming out :D, although I would had thought it would have better particals (gas) instead of the original green gas.....I would have liked to see some kind of Ghostly gas instead.

replies.body:
the particles are a let down, but at least it's not a 975 without any changes.

would have liked to see dark gas and orangey goo though

bird mask still fresh
well, either its a 750 rp skin with no new particles, or its a 975/1350 skin with new particles.
All singed other skins are (excluding hextech) are 975 but have no new particles except Snow day. That's 6 inc the new skin which have no new parttcles
